name: Matchismo - cards & pair
description:
Matchismo - Brainstorming matching game!

Awesome combo game of playing card and block pairs to match.

Playing card game :
- Try to match your card by opening random or remember the card.
- If you matched with the same number you will get 16 points.
- If you matched with the same card type you will get 4 points.
- The wrong match will penalty 2 points.

Blocks pair game :
- Try to match your pairs by click on any appropriate pairs.
- You need to match here 3 pairs: 2 with empty pairs and 1 with a filled pair.
- If you matched successfully, you will get 16 points.
- The wrong match will penalty 2 points.


> You can see your scores and keep a history of it as well.
> You can reset the game when you tired or finish the ​game.
